title: Birthday Vault
description:
Birthday Vault is a journal you write in just once a year - on your birthday. Send a message to your future self, then watch the countdown until next year when you can unlock what past-you wrote.

Perfect for those who can't stick with daily journaling. Five simple prompts help you capture memories, surprises, gratitude, goals, and a note to future-you.

Each birthday, unwrap a message from past-you and create one for next year's you.
